title: Independent
desc: releax os is developed from scratch. and doesn't dependends on any other distro or didn't use any existing distro as its base

title: Freedom
desc: releax os is a gnu/linux distro and avaliable freely to modify, distribute and redistribute.

title: Simple
desc: all the tools and techniques used in releax os provide easily operatability

title: *mgr
desc: releax os provide homegrown system managment tools to help user to manage system easily and safely

title: Openrc
desc: releax os uses openrc as its init system and service manager for fast bootup and easy (traditional) managment

title: Xfce
desc: Xfce is selected to provide desktop interface and utilities to releax os for its simplicity, efficiency and light weight
